title: Krampus' Bad Fur Day
description:
Krampus is just not feeling up to punishing bad children this year.
Every gift-giver needs their counterpart, and when Saint Nicholas goes out on the eve of December 5th to reward all the good children with presents, he needs his best friend Krampus to march alongside him, to punish the bad children and carry them away to his cave. When Nicholas arrives at Krampus' door, however, Krampus is in a his fur is matted, his glowing eyes have dimmed, and Krampus declares that he feels too ugly and low to accompany Nicholas.Nicholas declares an intervention and takes Krampus on a visit to Orcus, to brighten his spirits and get him looking his very best for the holiday season. Will Krampus have enough confidence to go on his yearly walk and lead the Krampus parade?
author: Michelle Franklin
